trans-unit.id: Authentication cannot be completed at this time. Please try again later.

trans-unit.note: Header for settings of reminders automatically added by TripGo through the agenda

trans-unit.id: Bookings made with TripGo will appear here.

Schade. Willst du uns sagen warum?

trans-unit.target: Reguläre Ereignisse werden in den Kalendern deines Geräts gespeichert.

trans-unit.id: Convenience is affected by things such as changing public transport services, the amount of walking, and finding a taxi.

trans-unit.target: Komfort wird davon beeinflusst, wie oft Verkehrsmittel gewechselt werden müssen, wieviel man laufen muss, die Schwierigkeit ein Taxi finden usw.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: Den AGBs muss für die Buchung zugestimmt werden.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C must be agreed before booking can be made.

alt-trans.target: Den AGBs müssen für die Buchung zugestimmt werden.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C for insurance must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Kalenderzugriffsautorisierung benötigt. Bitte aktiviere sie in der Einstellungen-App unter Datenschutz > Kalender > TripGo.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Addressbuchzugriffsautorisierung benötigt. Bitte aktiviere sie in der Einstellungen-App unter Datenschutz > Kontakte > TripGo.

trans-unit.note: Indicator that an event is all-day
Estimated time of arrival; parameter is time, e.g., 'arrives 15:30'
Estimated time of departure; parameter is time, e.g., 'departs 15:30'
Credit card expiry date placeholder, mm/yy
Name for a {Name}'s place if it's unclear if it's home, work or something else.
